#排课系统简化操作界面

目前排课采用的接口是：

https://yuekeapi.xingxingzhihuo.com.cn/WebApi/addRowClass.aspx

payload：
{"Cycle":"1","StoresID":"1517","LoginID":"15200", "CourseID":"27775", "Timelength":"60","startTimes":"2025/5/26","endTimes":"2025/5/26","preAboutType":"2","limitCount":"9","MinCount":"3","ConsumptionOfClass":"1","startTime":"08:00","PeriodOfTime":"1","LevelID":"1","AmemberCard":"23503","singlePrice":"135","RowClassType":"0","ListRowClassTime":"[]","difficulty":"1","CourseName":"软开","integral":"0","shour":"08","sminute":"00","RowClassTypeqt":"1","payPrice":0,"IsPay":0,"RowType":"1","SiteID":"365","SiteIDs":"","Site":"","SKtime":"2025/5/26","token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJaSFlLIiwiZXhwIjoxNzQ5ODk5MTg3LCJzdWIiOiJKV1QiLCJhdWQiOiIxNDkwOSIsImlhdCI6IjIwMjUvNi8xMyAxOTowNjoyNyIsImRhdGEiOnsiTmFtZSI6IumSn-.Yshjd4xFVKIZF7JhBafgG5jPD5fPhnGV-Nac6RhqtsE"}

response：
{
  "orsuccess": "1",
  "Msg": "新增成功"
}

其中，payload中的 course （课程id和名字等信息）相关从 接口 ：https://yuekeapi.xingxingzhihuo.com.cn/WebApi/getlistCourse.aspx 获取，payload 为：{"StoresID":"1517","token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJaSFlLIiwiZXhwIjoxNzQ5ODk5MTg3LCJzdWIiOiJKV1QiLCJhdWQiOiIxNDkwOSIsImlhdCI6IjIwMjUvNi8xMyAxOTowNjoyNyIsImRhdGEiOnsiTmFtZSI6IumSn-.Yshjd4xFVKIZF7JhBafgG5jPD5fPhnGV-Nac6RhqtsE"}，你可以尝试调用后看到response再决定实现；

loginID 是老师的 ID，通过接口 https://yuekeapi.xingxingzhihuo.com.cn/WebApi/getSelectTeacher.aspx 获取，payload：{"StoresID":"1517","selectName":"","token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJaSFlLIiwiZXhwIjoxNzQ5ODk5MTg3LCJzdWIiOiJKV1QiLCJhdWQiOiIxNDkwOSIsImlhdCI6IjIwMjUvNi8xMyAxOTowNjoyNyIsImRhdGEiOnsiTmFtZSI6IumSn-.Yshjd4xFVKIZF7JhBafgG5jPD5fPhnGV-Nac6RhqtsE"}，返回值中对应老师 ID 即这里传入的 loginID

"limitCount":"9","MinCount":"3 是最大人数9人，最小人数3人，可以设置；

"singlePrice":"135 是单价135，默认可以按照 src/config/price_strategy.json 中的默认值根据时长填写。

SiteID 是教室id，从https://yuekeapi.xingxingzhihuo.com.cn/WebApi/getListSite.aspx 获取列表后选择，payload：{"StoresID":"1517","pages":1,"psize":10000,"token":"eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJaSFlLIiwiZXhwIjoxNzQ5ODk5MTg3LCJzdWIiOiJKV1QiLCJhdWQiOiIxNDkwOSIsImlhdCI6IjIwMjUvNi8xMyAxOTowNjoyNyIsImRhdGEiOnsiTmFtZSI6IumSn-.Yshjd4xFVKIZF7JhBafgG5jPD5fPhnGV-Nac6RhqtsE"}

请帮我实现一个方便的可快速选择时间课程老师等，批量排课的页面。这个排课系统和现有的修改课程价格、核账等不用一起运行，可以单独运行。排课可以采用表格式，先把信息选好，然后批量排课。请根据上面的信息规划实现，如果有需要测试，或者需要我提供更多信息的地方，先提出解决后再实现。
